description: Applies specific quality measurements to evaluate content against defined criteria. This decorator enhances verification by providing quantifiable assessments of aspects like accuracy, completeness, clarity, or other custom metrics.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: Specific quality metrics to measure (e.g., accuracy, completeness, clarity, usefulness)

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: Rating scale to use for evaluations

parameters.name: explanation
parameters.description: Whether to provide detailed explanations for each metric score

examples.description: Basic quality assessment of an analysis
examples.usage:
+++QualityMetrics
My analysis of the financial market trends is as follows...
examples.result: Provides the analysis of financial market trends, followed by 1-5 ratings across standard quality metrics with explanations for each score

examples.description: Specific custom metrics with detailed qualitative assessment
examples.usage:
+++QualityMetrics(metrics=[factual accuracy,predictive value,consideration of alternatives,logical flow], scale=qualitative, explanation=true)
Here's my policy proposal for urban housing...
examples.result: Delivers the policy proposal, followed by qualitative assessments (poor/fair/good/excellent) of the four specified metrics, with detailed explanations for each evaluation
